version_description:
* Added motion triggered email notification.
* Added support to common email providers.
* Ready for the upcoming iOS update.

* Added two additional recording mode: Motion-Triggered and Scheduled.
* Added the screen to schedule recording at certain day and time.
* Performance enhancement when recording multiple cameras.

* Added an option to force TCP connection to RTSP based IP cameras.
* Bug fixes.

* Added an option to force TCP connection to RTSP based IP cameras.
* Bug fixes.
